pull_request.title: Liboqs test
pull_request.body:
Implementing #147 . Might be replicated as-is to other liboqs-dependent projects.

Also corrects CPU-optimization disablement on CircleCI.

pull_request.title: Enable cross-compilation for Android
pull_request.body: Add build script and modify CMakeLists.txt to fix pieces which break Android build.

pull_request.title: Fixing oqsconfig.h.cmake
pull_request.body:
@baentsch encountered this error while building HAProxy with liboqs:

```
src/backend.c:1483:17: error: operator '&&' has no left operand
```
 due to this line:
```
1483 | #if USE_OPENSSL && (defined(OPENSSL_IS_BORINGSSL) || (HA_OPENSSL_VERSION_NUMBER >= 0x10101000L))
```

i.e `USE_OPENSSL`, is defined and used, but not assigned a value, by liboqs, thereby causing an error in HAProxy, which also uses the same macro.

This PR therefore adds an `OQS_` prefix to all the `#define`s in `oqsconfig.h.cmake` and assigns them a value.

pull_request.title: Fixing oqsconfig.h.cmake
pull_request.body:
@baentsch encountered this error while building HAProxy with liboqs:

```
src/backend.c:1483:17: error: operator '&&' has no left operand
```
 due to this line:
```
1483 | #if USE_OPENSSL && (defined(OPENSSL_IS_BORINGSSL) || (HA_OPENSSL_VERSION_NUMBER >= 0x10101000L))
```

i.e `USE_OPENSSL`, is defined and used, but not assigned a value, by liboqs, thereby causing an error in HAProxy, which also uses the same macro.

This PR therefore adds an `OQS_` prefix to all the `#define`s in `oqsconfig.h.cmake` and assigns them a value.
